MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay affecting properties in Hillside Road, Rhiw Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 5:10am. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault on Hillside Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:50am on 15th January 2021.
